name: Ema datshi

name: Kewa datshi
short_description: Easy to prepare, yet extremely nourishing, kewa datsi is a traditional dish consisting of potatoes stewed with cheese, onions, and chilis. It is usually served with rice or flatbreads such as puri. Th...

name: Jasha maroo
short_description: Jasha maroo is a traditional dish consisting of diced chicken that is cooked with garlic, ginger, chiles, and tomato sauce. This combination of ingredients is usually served on top of red or brown ric...

name: Phaksha paa
short_description: Phaksha paa is a Bhutanese dish consisting of dried pork cooked with a variety of hot red chilis. There are many versions of the dish, most often incorporating ingredients such as spinach, radish, and...

name: Shamu datshi
short_description: Shamu datshi is a flavorful Bhutanese stew consisting of various types of mushrooms stewed in a combination of water, oil, and green chilis. Cheese is added in the end and left to melt slowly with oth...

name: Datshi
